name: Rings Of Dragon
description:
Magic MMO game, BOSS drops all props, all resources can be obtained within the game, truly suitable for free players to play the game.

◆Auction
Through the auction, you can turn the i resources in your hand into Yuan Bao and diamonds!

◆Diverse maps◆
Bounty map: You can get a lot of mount resources, wing resources, rune resources, etc. from here
Dark Trials: Challenge the Dark Trials to prove your strength, and you can get a lot of resources
BOSS map: dozens of different maps have increasingly high BOSS, dropping high-level equipment

◆Featured Garden System◆
Homeland system: After joining the guild, you can experience the homeland system to make the guild more powerful
Illustration system: you can get many illustrations during the game, and you can improve your own battle power after collecting them
Jumbo system: divided into mount jumbo, clothing jumbo, weapon jumbo, get a set of not only cool appearance, but also a lot of attributes to improve

◆Numerous playing methods◆
Every day there will be rich rewards of daily activities open, you can get a lot of gold, diamonds and various props
